title: 26 - Wells and Fences - Spiritual Abuse Part 1
description:
In this episode we explore the relevance of Flash Gordon for today's world.  Andy succeeds in asking good questions regardless of his lack of biblical knowledge.  We talk about kicking people out of church and who gets to stay.    This is the first of a series addressing the dynamics of spiritual abuse and healing for those who have been hurt by the church. *Earmuff warning for parents or those sensitive to a singular usage of mild fowl language*

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com

Subscribe on iTunes - http://apple.co/1Lla1Nj
